title: TypeScript 3.9 and more
description: A virtual meetup going over new features introduced in TypeScript 3.7, 3.8, and 3.9.

title: Dojo 6: TypeScript-first reactive framework
description: a brief introduction to the Dojo Framework and a look at many of the new features and patterns. This talk will provide an intro/refresher to Dojo; functional widgets and middleware; build time rendering; custom elements & widget libraries

title: TypeScript for Node.js
description: The talk covers how to best setup TypeScript for working with Node.js, and a look at a variety of TypeScript packages for Node.js including, Nest, TypeORM, and more.

title: Intro to Custom Elements
description: An introduction to Custom Elements and Web Components.

title: TS 3.1 and 3.2, and Web Audio and Web Animations with TS
description: I cover some of the additions in TypeScript 3.1 and 3.2. The main presentation looks at using Web Animations and Web Audio within a TypeScript application.

title: TS 3.0 and Dojo version 3 updates
description: A look at what's new in TypeScript 3.0 and provide a summary of the Dojo version 3 release.

title: Intro to Nest
description: Nest is server-side framework featuring Dependency Injection, @decorators, and types. Written in TypeScript on top of Express it provides an opinioned pattern that removes a lot of boilerplate and gets straight to business (logic ;).

title: TS 2.8 and TSConf recap
description: A look at what's new in TypeScript 2.8 and provide a summary of the things we learned at the first ever TSConf!

title: A closer look at TS 2.6 and 2.7
description: A look at what's new in TypeScript 2.6 and what's planned for the 2.7 release.

title: Derpymon (TS, WebVR, AFrame, and Dojo 2 game)
description: Derpymon is a WebVR app built using A-Frame and Dojo 2 and all of their related technologies. Come see the future as we provide an light introduction to A-Frame and Dojo 2, talk about best practices for navigating custom elements with reactive frameworks, and show how we built Derpymon into a custom element of its own using Webpack and Dojo 2 build tools.

title: What's new in TS 2.3 and 2.4?
description: Covering some of the new features available in TypeScript 2.3 and 2.4. He'll also answer questions over iterators, async/await, generators, and generics as we delve into what's new in TypeScript.

title: Getting Started with TypeScript
description: A talk about TypeScript covering what you need to know and how TypeScript makes for a great developer experience.

title: Continuous Delivery in Open Source
description:
Dojo is a JavaScript toolkit with over a decade of history supplying tooling to engineers and the enterprise. As part of a major rewrite to modernize the framework, we’ve updated the dojo.io site to be continuously deployed on a completely FOSS stack.

Come join us for an inside look at how we’ve integrated GitHub, Travis CI, git, TypeDoc, Hexo, and Intern with a little bit of TypeScript to provide a better developer experience for the Dojo community.

title: Ambient Declarations
description: A talk covering ambient declarations and their uses in TypeScript.

title: Features in TypeScript 2.0+
description: An overview of all the new features in TypeScript 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 and how to take advantage of these improvements to TypeScript!

title: TypeScript development workflow
description: Several approaches to setting up a good TypeScript development workflow.

title: Exploring WebVR with TypeScript
description: an overview of WebVR and its usage with TypeScript, including A-Frame and WebVR.

title: Dojo 2, TypeScript, and Electron
description: Creating a desktop application using Dojo 2, TypeScript, and Electron.

title: Intro to TS and more
description: Introduction to TypeScript. What it is. What it does for you. And how to start using it.
